projects: A full stack MERN web app, based on the MongoDB database. The app includes a Firebase Login and is styled with TailwindCSS. Also included is every single CRUD operation in the interactive part of the app. The user can upload, update or delete data at his own discretion. This includes images, titles, or descriptions for the several sections of the app, which are listed here: - A Blog with image, title, date and text - Gallery for highlighting of precious images - A story section where the user can create collection of images in a gallery with the option to describe them - Whole bunch of minor features, including the display of random images

A full stack, including MySQL, Express.js, React and Node.js, web app. The app is fully animated with Framer Motion and styled with the help of TailwindCSS. A Firebase Login guarantees a feature rich and interactive user experience. - Highly interactive web app with stylish and modern animations - Based on the most modern technologies available - Option to post recipes with selectable tags, description and images - Search the database for recipes through name, tag and description

My personal portfolio website where I present my projects. This is an SEO optimized Next.js web APP. A portfolio needs to be fast, easy to understand and to the point. That's why I chose Server Side Rendering (SSR) for the architecture. This is also reflected in the developer console tool Lighthouse analytics with a rating of 100/100. A portfolio should be fast and reliable. To create consistent and repeatable design elements with beautiful effects, third-party libraries Framer Motion and TailwindCSS support the design. To accommodate multilingualism, I18next was used. This allows me to quickly add more languages. At the moment English and German are supported. To sum it up: My portfolio is a minimalistic but feature-rich and bulletproof web APP written using TypeScript as my language of choice.
